profileAlternative.name: Alejandro Lucena
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer at Apple
profileAlternative.summary:
*Familiarity with lock-free and wait-free data structures.

*Exerience writing optimized assembly or C/C++ routines

*Experience profiling and deploying high-performance, multithreaded applications in C++.

*Knowledge of x86 architecture (cache hierarchy, instruction set, SIMD), Linux kernel and compiler optimizations.

* C++ Template Metaprogramming

*Research and projects in probabilistic algorithms and approaches to autonomous navigation of mobile robots.

* Have successfully implemented intelligent agents and robots using AI/ML algorithms, including a fully working autonomous RC car.

* Researching on the use of evolutionary neural networks and convex classifiers with reinforcement learning to produce intelligent agents.

* Developed applications for the iPhone and Android platforms with over 2000 downloads.

Security:

*Finished 4th place nationally in the sCTF hacking competition

* Finished in top 1.5% of teams in a national hacking competition -- picoCTF hosted by Carnegie Mellon University

Educative Experience:
* TA for Stanford Machine Learning course
* Team oriented programming competitions
* Attended 5 day C++ conference (CppCon 2014, CppCon 2015)

* Maintenance of efficient and performance tuned software for a variety of programming languages and environments such as C, C++, Octave, Python, C#, Java, and Objective-C.

* Maintenance of well-vectorized , efficient, and performance tuned software for computationally expensive operations, machine learning algorithms, and artificial intelligence based algorithms

* Years of programming experience with C/C++ , C++11, Objective-C, Java, PHP, Python, C#, and .NET Technologies

positions.title: Contract Software Developer
positions.description: I developed an application that expedites and automates several processes within Cooper General. These processes used to be done manually and were often bottlenecks in production, which also presented themselves to human error.

positions.title: Consulting Software Developer
positions.description: Cooper General Global Services needed software to allow for proper checking of inventory which boosted employee productivity.

educations.title: Udacity
educations.degree: Computer Networking -- Georgia Tech CS 6250 Equivalent Course

peopleAlsoViewed.text: iOS Software Engineer - Siri at Apple
Software Engineer at Facebook AI Research
